title: No longer offered the option to use FILELINK
content:
A few months ago I posted a question "I'm no longer offered the option to use FILELINK". There was a solution offered by user Yu5tiqX9og. That post has apparently been archived, so I'm unable to see whether Yu5tiqX9og's solution/reply was ever posted. I managed to keep a copy of his solution, which he must have sent to me privately. 

  I italic text do remember that it did fix the problem I was having.   Here is the reply.

italic textThe following steps might be helpful: "Settings" > "Composition" > "Attachments" section > tick "Offer to share for files larger than __ MB. (Please see the attached image.)"

I don't have the exact image from the original post, but I've recreated what I believe it probably was. Please see attachment. I hope this helps, SweetTasha
